Registry of Open Data on AWS

Usage examples for all datasets listed in the Registry of Open Data on AWS tagged with cities.

OpenAQ

Tutorials
  • Access OpenAQ data via a filterable SNS topic by OpenAQ
  • Analyze Global Air Pollution Using Apache Spark & BigQuery by Kapil Sreedharan
  • Using Athena to access the whole archive by OpenAQ
Tools & Applications
  • ARISense by Aerodyne Research, Inc.
  • hackAIR by hackAir
  • OpenAQ Aggregator by Kapil Sreedharan
  • ropenaq R package by Maëlle Salmon
  • Smokey: Air Quality Bot by Amrit Sharma
Publications
  • Enabling rapid COVID-19 and air pollution analysis across the globe with OpenAQ and AWS by Christa Hasenkopf

New York City Taxi and Limousine Commission (TLC) Trip Record Data

Tutorials
  • Build a Real-time Stream Processing Pipeline with Apache Flink on AWS by Steffen Hausmann
  • Build and run streaming applications with Apache Flink and Amazon Kinesis Data Analytics for Java Applications by Steffen Hausmann
  • Deep Dive on Flink & Spark on Amazon EMR by Keith Steward
  • Exploring data with Python and Amazon S3 Select by Manav Sehgal
  • Optimizing data for analysis with Amazon Athena and AWS Glue by Manav Sehgal

Prefeitura Municipal de São Paulo (PMSP) LiDAR Point Cloud

Tools & Applications
  • Entwine by Hobu, Inc.
  • Fusion by US Department of Agriculture - Forest Service
  • LAStools by rapidlasso GmbH, GERMANY
  • PDAL - Point Data Abstraction Library by PDAL Contributors
Publications
  • Describing the Vertical Structure of Informal Settlements on the Basis of LiDAR Data – A Case Study for Favelas (Slums) in Sao Paulo City by S. C. L. Ribeiro, M. Jarzabek-Rychard, J. P. Cintra, H.-G. Maas

Open City Model (OCM)

Tutorials
  • Running queries on Open City Model using AWS Athena by Allen Gilliland
  • Using Open City Model with the 3dCityDB by Allen Gilliland

Speedtest by Ookla Global Fixed and Mobile Network Performance Maps

Tutorials
  • New Year, Great Data: The Best Ookla Open Data Projects We’ve Seen So Far by Katie Jolly

Swiss Public Transport Stops

Tools & Applications
  • Map Viewer by Swiss Geoportal

If you want to add a dataset or usage example to this registry, please follow the instructions on the Registry of Open Data on AWS GitHub repository.
